ygData.subject: Bard Equipment Question
ygData.msgSnippet: I noticed yesterday that a lot of you higher level folks have the skull shaped barbute and I am aware of the fact that it drops from the ghoul lord in lower
ygData.messageBody:
I noticed yesterday that a lot of you higher level folks have the skull
shaped barbute and I am aware of the fact that it drops from the ghoul lord
in lower guk. I was wondering if it is the rare or the common drop and
about how much it sells for.

Last evening I was on my way out of North Freeport and just as I was about
to zone I caught someone auctioning one for 400pp, so I went and grabbed it.
I don't know if this is a good price but I didn't care much because I was
able to turn around and sell my medium steel helm for 333pp so I pretty much
broke even on the deal.

How do you think this helm compares as a choice at my level (35) with other
similar headgear like the Crested Helm, the Crown of the Froglok Kings, and
the Lambent Helm? I really can't get enough magic resistance and the +35 hit
points is nice when combined with my lambent BP giving me an overall bonus
of 60 hit points, which laughably is like a "free hit" from most of the
stuff I am fighting now.

Comments, suggestions?

-Faras
